text:
Dear Mr Alex Dupont,
I'm actually at my first year in the Rennes 2 University in Sciences of Education. I would like to contact you because the last month I was at a party with my promo and I talk with a person that we mutually know.  Allow me to ask you because we have talk about my future project to become a profesor in an English country.
I would like to eventually contact or meet you, if you would like to light me at this subject. I think it's a beautiful and huge occasion for me to meet you.
More precisely I want you to know my intentions. I really want to study  in an English country because I think if I am in the lot, if I can tell this like this, I'm probably more likely to become school teacher in an English country.
I really love this language firstly because it's the principal language in the world but also because it's like an natural objectif for me, even if I'm not bilingue, I try to do my best in this language and I hope one day I can be the teacher of my dreams. In fact, become school teacher is a good opportunity if I am in Paris, it's also one of my different objectives, but, I really want to do this, in another country, it can be Paris, Paris... as long as he correspond to my project it's perfect for me.
I don't know if my profil can interest you, but I try, and I hope he remembers your intention.
I know and I understand that I'm just at my first year of my licence but I really want you to show you my projects and my determination.
Thank you for your attention,
I'm waiting for you reply,
Alex Dupont
